page.title: 12ONGAR'S TWIN - CERIZAY
page.content: Ongar was twinned with a French town called{Cerizay}in{1985}.This was arranged by Ongar Parish Council with the help of The Joint Twinning Committee. Cerizay was chosen because the Councils liked each other and the towns were of similar size. It was decided to hold the first twinning ceremony in the context of {Fete de la Ville. Schools are an important part of the twinning,an example of which was shown when a party of{41}schoolchildren from Cerizay came to Ongar in May,1985. { CERIZAY-FACTS AND FIGURES Cerizay has 5,000 inhabitants and is in the Departement des Deux_Sevres. Agriculture is very important in this area, particulary livestock. Cerizay has a car factory owned by Heuliez a large car (Cont. on Page 13)
